registerServiceAsync

public static <T> Future<org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistration> registerServiceAsync(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bc,
                                                                                      Class<T> clazz,
                                                                                      T service,
                                                                                      Dictionary properties)
Registers service asynchronously

Parameters:
bc - BundleContext
clazz - The class under which the service can be located.
service - The service object or a ServiceFactory object.
properties - The properties for this service.
Returns:
A Future<ServiceRegistration> object for use by the bundle registering the service to update the service's properties or to unregister the service.
Since:
1.1

registerServiceAsync

public static Future<org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistration> registerServiceAsync(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bc,
                                                                                  String clazz,
                                                                                  Object service,
                                                                                  Dictionary properties)
Registers service asynchronously

Parameters:
bc - BundleContext
clazz - The class name under which the service can be located.
service - The service object or a ServiceFactory object.
properties - The properties for this service.
Returns:
A Future<ServiceRegistration> object for use by the bundle registering the service to update the service's properties or to unregister the service.
Since:
1.1

registerServiceAsync

public static Future<org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistration> registerServiceAsync(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bc,
                                                                                  String[] clazzes,
                                                                                  Object service,
                                                                                  Dictionary properties)
Registers service asynchronously

Parameters:
bc - BundleContext
clazzes - The class names under which the service can be located. The class names in this array will be stored in the service's properties under the key Constants.OBJECTCLASS.
service - The service object or a ServiceFactory object.
properties - The properties for this service.
Returns:
A Future<ServiceRegistration> object for use by the bundle registering the service to update the service's properties or to unregister the service.
Since:
1.1

registerServiceAsync

public static <T> Future<org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistration> registerServiceAsync(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bc,
                                                                                      Class<T> clazz,
                                                                                      T service,
                                                                                      Dictionary properties,
                                                                                      long delayInMillis)
Registers service asynchronously with delayInMillis

Parameters:
bc - BundleContext
clazz - The class under which the service can be located.
service - The service object or a ServiceFactory object.
properties - The properties for this service.
delayInMillis - time interval in millis to wait before registration. If zero, the method will not wait.
Returns:
A Future<ServiceRegistration> object for use by the bundle registering the service to update the service's properties or to unregister the service.
Since:
1.1

clazz - The class under which the service can be located.
service - The service object or a ServiceFactory object.
properties - The properties for this service.
delay - time interval to wait before registration. If zero, the method will not wait.
timeUnit - time unit for the time interval
Returns:
A Future<ServiceRegistration> object for use by the bundle registering the service to update the service's properties or to unregister the service.
Since:
1.1

registerServiceAsync

public static Future<org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistration> registerServiceAsync(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bc,
                                                                                  String[] clazzes,
                                                                                  Object service,
                                                                                  Dictionary properties,
                                                                                  long delay,
                                                                                  TimeUnit timeUnit)
Registers service asynchronously with delay

Parameters:
bc - BundleContext
clazzes - The class names under which the service can be located. The class names in this array will be stored in the service's properties under the key Constants.OBJECTCLASS.
service - The service object or a ServiceFactory object.
properties - The properties for this service.
delay - time interval to wait before registration. If zero, the method will not wait.
timeUnit - time unit for the time interval
Returns:
A Future<ServiceRegistration> object for use by the bundle registering the service to update the service's properties or to unregister the service.
Since:
1.1

updateServiceAsync

public static Future<?> updateServiceAsync(org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistration registration,
                                           Dictionary properties)
Updates registered service properties asynchronously

Parameters:
registration - Service registration
properties - The properties for this service. See Constants for a list of standard service property keys. Changes should not be made to this object after calling this method. To update the service's properties this method should be called again.
Returns:
The Future's get method will return null upon successful completion.
Since:
1.1
